body_html:
I reproduced your numbers now. I removed cudnn5 from /usr/local/cuda/include and /usr/local/cuda/include/lib64 but i'm not sure if that was the problem or if i somehow messed up with the paths. The only odd thing is that fp16 seems to be slower than fp32 on a maxwell titan X.

Your help is much appreciated! :)
body_text:
I reproduced your numbers now. I removed cudnn5 from /usr/local/cuda/include and /usr/local/cuda/include/lib64 but i'm not sure if that was the problem or if i somehow messed up with the paths. The only odd thing is that fp16 seems to be slower than fp32 on a maxwell titan X.

body:
I reproduced your numbers now. I removed cudnn5 from `/usr/local/cuda/include` and `/usr/local/cuda/include/lib64` but i'm not sure if that was the problem or if i somehow messed up with the paths. The only odd thing is that fp16 seems to be slower than fp32 on a maxwell titan X. 

Your help is much appreciated! :)
